description: Enhance Claude's reasoning capabilities with a dedicated tool for structured thinking. Use this tool to navigate complex problem-solving tasks effectively, ensuring adherence to policies and improving decision-making processes. Optimize your interactions with Claude by leveraging the think tool for better outcomes in multi-step analyses.

capabilities.name: think
capabilities.description: Use this tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information or change anything, but just append the thought to the log. Use it when complex reasoning or cache memory is needed, especially during long chains of tool calls, policy adherence scenarios, or sequential decision making.

capabilities.name: get_thoughts
capabilities.description: Retrieve all thoughts recorded in the current session to review your reasoning process.

capabilities.name: clear_thoughts
capabilities.description: Clear all thoughts recorded in the current session. Use this to start fresh if the thinking process needs to be reset.

capabilities.name: get_thought_stats
capabilities.description: Get statistics about the thoughts recorded in the current session to analyze your thinking process.
